text: "Whatever Gets You Thru the Night" is a 1974 song by John Lennon and was the lead single from his fifth studio album Walls and Bridges. It was the only number 1 in the United States in his lifetime and also went to number 2 in Canada, number 12 in Italy and number 15 in South Africa. It was covered by Elton John live in 1981. Category:1974 songs Category:John Lennon songs Category:Elton John songs
title: Whatever Gets You Thru the Night
